meanings.definition: Small, slender projections on the surface of a cell
meanings.sent1: The microvilli on the cell help increase its surface area for absorption.
meanings.sent2: Under the microscope, you can see the microvilli on the cell membrane.
meanings.sent3: The microvilli on the cell were having a race to see who could absorb nutrients faster.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was like the microvilli, constantly reaching out for new information.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to show how microvilli work on a cell.

meanings.definition: Tiny hair-like structures on the surface of certain cells
meanings.sent1: The microvilli on the cells in the intestine aid in nutrient absorption.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the function of microvilli in different types of cells.
meanings.sent3: The microvilli on the cells danced in the breeze like tiny hair strands.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as sharp as the microvilli on the cell surface.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes were as delicate as microvilli on a cell.
